content: learn something new this uniquely-styled market bag uses clever techniques where you can continuously crochet mini granny squares one after the other this means there is no sewing required and no yarn tails to weave in it is an ideal market bag for carrying apples and all kinds of other produce as well the best yarn for this project is fingering weight cotton in solid colors anything thicker means the holes might end up being too big color changing yarns will produce unexpected results to accompany this pattern a youtube video 1 is available 1 https //youtu be/onfmo20m-qw
